patterns: What are my ground transportation options in Bozeman?
Are there shuttle services from Bozeman Airport?
Is there public transportation in Bozeman?
How do I get around Bozeman without a car?
Can I rent a bike in Bozeman?
Are there scooters available in Bozeman?
Is there any free public transport in Bozeman?
How do I get from Bozeman to Big Sky without driving?
Are there rental cars at Bozeman Airport?
What’s the best way to travel between Bozeman and Belgrade?
Can I get an Uber in Big Sky?
What are the taxi services in Belgrade, MT?
Is there a shuttle from Big Sky to the airport?
How can I get to Bozeman from the airport without a car?
Are there bike or e-bike rentals in Big Sky?
What kind of transportation is available in Belgrade?
Is there a shuttle from Belgrade to Bozeman?
Where can I find scooter rentals in Bozeman?
Are there local car rentals in Belgrade?
What transportation is available for visitors without a car?
intents.response:
🚐 **Ground Transportation Guide for Bozeman, Big Sky & Belgrade**

### 🚍 Shuttle Services from Bozeman Airport
- **Karst Stage**: BZN ↔ Big Sky. Shared & private shuttles. [karststage.com](https://www.karststage.com)
- **Peak Shuttle**: Private SUV shuttle, 24/7, flight tracking. [peakshuttle.com](https://www.peakshuttle.com)
- **Bozeman 365 Shuttle**: Shared/private shuttle to Big Sky, West Yellowstone. [bozeman365shuttle.com](https://www.bozeman365shuttle.com)
- **Big Sky Shuttle Inc.**: Winter seasonal & private charters. [bigskyshuttle.net](https://www.bigskyshuttle.net)

### 🚖 Local Taxi Services
- **Greater Valley Taxi** (Bozeman/Belgrade): (406) 388-9999
- **Spartan Taxi**: (406) 624-8438
- **MyBZN Black Car**: [mybzn.com](https://www.mybzn.com)
- **Uber/Lyft**: Widely available in Bozeman & Belgrade; limited in Big Sky

### 🚌 Public Transit
- **Streamline Bus (HRDC)**: Free in Bozeman/Belgrade. [streamlinebus.com](https://www.streamlinebus.com)
  - Routes to MSU, downtown, Four Corners, and Belgrade
- **Skyline Bus (Big Sky)**: Local routes; $5 from Bozeman to Big Sky. [skylinebus.com](https://www.skylinebus.com)

### 🚲 Bike & Scooter Rentals
- **Bozeman Bike Rentals**: (406) 586-8029 – hybrid, cruiser, mountain bikes
- **Ofo & Spin**: No longer active. Use private bike shops or Airbnb hosts
- **E-bike Rentals**:
  - **Big Sky Resort**: Summer rentals on the mountain
  - **Owenhouse Cycling Bozeman**: E-bikes & mountain bikes

### 🛴 Scooter Rentals
- As of 2025, **no major scooter-share services** (like Lime/Bird) operate in Bozeman or Big Sky. Private rentals only.

### 🚗 Car Rentals
**Available at Bozeman Airport (BZN)**:
- Alamo, Avis, Budget, Enterprise, Hertz, National, Thrifty, Dollar

**In-town Car Rentals**:
- **Go Rentals** (luxury) – [gorentals.com](https://www.gorentals.com)
- **Turo**: Peer-to-peer rentals, usually cheaper than national brands

---

### 🧭 Local Tips
- Free HRDC buses are ideal for getting around town.
- For Big Sky trips: Reserve shuttles 48 hours ahead.
- E-bikes are growing in popularity for summer use in all three towns.
- Belgrade lacks local buses but is well-served by airport taxis.

seasonal_notes: winter travel to Big Sky requires AWD
